room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Awesome experience! Had super fun doing the casino breakout. Although we didn't breakout in the allotted time, we were super close. Make sure you go with a group to maximize your fun!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: The ultimate social experiment. I recommend this for coworkers, friends, and families. Families beware. If you are a mom and you take your children of various ages over vacation week, you will need to go back another time with adults to redeem yourself!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Great experience, the employees were wicked nice and the escape room was mentally challenging. IÔ∏è would definitely do this again and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: We did the Casino room. It was challenging and very fun! We definitely are coming back very soon to try to escape the other ones!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: I've done both the Museum Heist and Casino escape rooms. Both were a lot of fun. The lobby hosts and our game masters were so nice and made my experience there great. Looking forward to going back to do more escape rooms in the future.
